meanings.definition: A gum resin obtained from a plant of the genus Opopanax, used in perfumery and medicine.
meanings.sent1: The opopanax added a pleasant scent to the perfume.
meanings.sent2: She bought a bottle of perfume with opopanax as one of the ingredients.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the jar of opopanax, creating a fragrant mess.
meanings.sent4: The opopanax resin was like a sweet whisper in the air.
meanings.sent5: The opopanax resin, with its soothing aroma, filled the room with tranquility.

meanings.definition: A fragrant gum resin obtained from the roots of a plant of the genus Opopanax, used in incense and perfumes.
meanings.sent1: The incense was made more aromatic with the addition of opopanax.
meanings.sent2: The perfumer carefully measured the opopanax resin for the new fragrance.
meanings.sent3: The opopanax resin seemed to dance in the air as the incense burned.
meanings.sent4: Her presence was like opopanax, leaving a lingering sweetness wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The opopanax resin released its captivating scent, enchanting all who passed by.
